title: 使用Valkyrien Warfare崩溃
author: 1a2s3d4f1
txt_content:
安装了Valkyrien Warfare在开飞船是经常崩溃









crash-2018-06-16_22.53.26-server.txt


2018-6-17 09:58 上传
点击文件名下载附件




8.97 KB, 下载次数: 7

replies.author: 草
replies.txt_content:
Remove FoamFixAPI (or replace with FoamFixAPI-Lawful) and try again. (FoamFix-1.12.2-0.9.4-Anarchy.jar)
可以试着用Lawful版的FoamFix“foamfix-0.9.9-1.12.2-law.jar”替换原有的“FoamFix-1.12.2-0.9.4-Anarchy.jar”
mcbbs内搬运帖

replies.author: 1a2s3d4f1
replies.txt_content:
